name: A Veggie Nightmare
description:
This is what happens when you don't eat your veggies: they haunt you in your dreams! It's a veggie nightmare!

Help a terrified kid escape her nightmare by throwing spells at evil tomatoes, carrots and mushrooms in this 2D casual platform game for Android. Eat junk food to heal your wounds and quickly tap the hasty hearts to replenish your HP bar. You should also avoid the pits by doing single or double jumps.

Win the three stages to escape the nightmare!

CREDITS: 

- Design, programming and art (evil veggies) by Franco Pistasoli.

- Free assets: 

   * Models, textures, materials and particle effects by Riezo, Creepy Cat, Andtech, Aurynsky, Cattleya, EmaceArt, Farland Skies, N-hance Studio, Swift Games, Digital Ruby.

   * UI: Poneti (jump and attack buttons).

   * Background music and sound effects by OpenGameArt.org.
